Status.Cause: The requested policy data is included in the response
No policy of the requested type is defined on the server.
Status.Resolution: Stop sending policy information. No policy is implemented.

Status.Cause: The client sent a policy that the server does not recognize.
Status.Resolution: Issue a request with a value of "MS-EAS-Provisioning-WBXML" in the PolicyType element.

Status.Cause: The policy data on the server is corrupt.
The client is trying to acknowledge an out-of-date or invalid policy.
Status.Resolution: Issue a new Provision request to obtain a valid policy key.
